select * from ( select r.user_name as review_leader_name,r.user_id as review_leader_id,p.project_name,p.business_id,p.reporting_unit_name as reporting_unit_name, decode(p.type,'preAssessment','预评审','formalAssessment','正式评审','') as project_type, to_char(r.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') as start_time, to_char(p.complete_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as end_time, p.meeting_date as meeting_date, fun_get_workdays(r.create_time, nvl(p.complete_date, sysdate)) as use_days, decode(p.wf_state, '1','跟进中', '2','已完成','3','已终止','') as project_state, NVL( p.need_meeting , 1) as need_meeting from rcm_project_info p, rcm_project_relation r where p.business_id = r.business_id and r.relation_type in('0706','0710') ) ta where 1=1
and ta.project_state is not null and ta.review_leader_id='${review_leader_id}' and ta.review_leader_id = '${reviewLeaderId}' and to_char(ta.start_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = '${startTime}' and ta.project_name like '%${projectName}%' and ta.project_state = '${projectState}' and ta.reporting_unit_name like '%${reportingUnitName}%' and ta.project_type = '正式评审' and ta.project_state in ('跟进中','已完成') and ( ta.meeting_date > sysdate or ta.meeting_date is null) order by ta.start_time desc
